name: Collar × Malice
summary: Collar × Malice is a Japanese otome visual novel.

esrb.synopsis: This is a visual novel in which players assume the role of a police officer trying to save a city from a sinister organization. Some scenes depict still images of characters engaged in violent acts: a man punching a character, as cries of pain and impact sounds are heard; several figures bound to chairs before and after being shot to death; wounded characters with bloodstained clothing or trickles of blood on their mouths/faces. Several other scenes depict large blood-splatter effects staining the screen. The game contains brief references to sexual assault in the dialogue, though no activity is ever shown. Dialogue also mentions drugs/drug use (e.g., "...quantity of drugs on the bed," “Shimizu was on drugs,” “I guess if he was on drugs it'd make sense...”). The words “f**k” and “sh*t” appear in dialogue.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 16 years and over only.
It contains: Strong language - Mild bad language - Images or sounds likely to be horrifying
